msg: Made a bad message not kill the process but instead just drop the message.

msg: Disabling Ruby support because it's been broken and quite hard to fix since the switch to driver APIs

author: benh
msg: Updated code to use new tuples implementation.

author: benh
msg: Re-structured tuples support (in particular, made all serialization be inline, removed the need for a Tuple class, made heavy use of Boost tuples including making the tuple type extend from Boost tuple.
